long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Current features:
- Displays user's total followers/following counts, and user id on profile page.
- Scores on anime/manga lists are color coded, from green to red. Green being good, red being bad.
- More coming soon? maybe...
